name: ST@FF - Support Tool and Forum Frameset
short_description: ST@FF is a discussion forum/notesboard, designed for problem tracking, organized by argument/topic, supports access control, logging, keywords, e-mail notification, multiple instances, configurable self-registration and guest users.
